Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: This course examines the intersection between the transportation security industry, public law enforcement and private security.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Discussion of modern security administration and security-law enforcement interface, emphasizing a systems approach and utilizing the design of a security plan for a plant.

Course Description.text: Concepts and procedures for the development, implementation, and management of a physical security program and its application to assets protection.
